author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Pathfinder has undergone many changes over the past few years, but this recent one directly affects overseas folks like myself. Paizo announced the end of the long-running Pathfinder Adventure Path’s softcover books. Instead, Paizo will pivot to bigger hardcovers that compile adventures from start to finish.

Continue reading Paizo's new approach to Pathfinder Adventure Path is awesome for non-US players
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Pathfinder classes, DnD Maps, Best Tabletop RPGs
title: Paizo's new approach to Pathfinder Adventure Path is awesome for non-US players

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Gloomhaven and a bunch of other cool board games are on sale in Boardtopia’s Ding & Dent category. Let’s face it, tabletop gaming can be an expensive hobby. When purchasing something entirely brand new, many hobbyists simply close their eyes and think of the flowers as the money leaves their bank account. But just like any hobby, there are ways to game on a budget.

Continue reading Gloomhaven and other classic board games are on sale for thrifty players!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games, Board games for adults
title: Gloomhaven and other classic board games are on sale for thrifty players!

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Monte Cook Games just announced a new edition for Cypher, the iconic sci-fi tabletop RPG that showcases just how awesome TTRPGs can be outside of Dungeons and Dragons. Cypher is a fast-paced system that focuses on flexibility and narrative, making it easy for players and GMs alike. Everything from the character creator to the free-flowing combat makes Cypher one of the slickest tabletop RPGs I’ve ever played.

Continue reading The Cypher System's new edition gives me hope for DnD alternatives
title: The Cypher System's new edition gives me hope for DnD alternatives

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
It’s no secret that Warhammer is an expensive hobby. After all, those memes about the average 40k player treating their Imperial Titan purchases like buying a new car didn’t spring from nothing. Even so, many fans were willing to dish out the cash for the wargame hobby they loved. Unfortunately, it seems they’re gonna have to dish out a little bit more.

Continue reading Warhammer prices are going up again next month, Games Workshop confirms
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer prices are going up again next month, Games Workshop confirms
